Probably will polish, cam never tell until its in the polishers hands though.  Looks alright to me from here on first glance.
 
Alot more questions need to be answered.
 
Louis

Peter Farrar <pcfarrar@...> wrote:
Hi,

Can anyone give me an opinion if this Katana blade would polish?

I believe it to be a shinshinto Katana, the blade (cutting edge 26 
1/4") is very heavy and thick.

Its badly corroded and pitted on one side of the blade, the other 
side has only minor pitting and corrosion. The worst areas (deep 
pitting) are pictured in the link. The blade is still very sharp 
along the entire edge. The hamon is not visible at all.

Thanks for any help.

Images:

http://www.c.farrar.btinternet.co.uk/kat/

Peter
